document.full_text: mobile phones have fallen silent in afghanistan's southern helmand province on the orders of the taliban, telecoms engineers said, a potent reminder of insurgent power in an area chosen as the showcase for a transition to afghan security.
document.title: taliban stop cell phone signals in key afghan province
lines_and_colors: mobile phones have fallen silent in afghanistan's southern helmand province on the orders of the taliban, telecoms engineers said, a potent reminder of insurgent power in an area chosen as the showcase for a transition to afghan security.
